VI.ii.4.A.7.g
.
RO Liaison With CRSC Boards
CRSC boards are responsible for determining eligibility for CRSC.  In order to make a determination, these boards occasionally require
copies of records in VA’s possession, as discussed in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 4.A.7.i
, or
clarification of discrepant data, as discussed in
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 4.A.7.j
-
l
.
Each RO is responsible for designating an employee (the RO’s Military Records Specialist (MRS)) to serve as a liaison with CRSC boards.  MRSs are responsible for responding to requests from CRSC boards.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A - Elections and Waivers in Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases
citation: Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section A
